meanings.definition: The quality or state of being insane.
meanings.sent1: Her insaneness was evident in her wild and unpredictable behavior.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with insaneness after observing his erratic actions.
meanings.sent3: Despite her insaneness, she always had a kind smile for everyone she met.
meanings.sent4: The insaneness of the situation made it hard for anyone to make sense of what was happening.
meanings.sent5: The insaneness of the storm was like a whirlwind of chaos and confusion.

meanings.definition: The condition of being mentally ill or deranged.
meanings.sent1: His insaneness led him to believe he was a superhero fighting invisible villains.
meanings.sent2: The asylum housed individuals with various degrees of insaneness.
meanings.sent3: Despite his insaneness, he still had moments of clarity and lucidity.
meanings.sent4: The insaneness of his thoughts painted a vivid picture of his inner struggles.
meanings.sent5: The insaneness of her laughter echoed through the empty halls of the hospital.
